All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BBQChicken
Represents a pizza that is BBQChicken flavor, subclass of the Pizza class
BuildYourOwn
Represents a pizza that is Custom flavor, subclass of the Pizza class
BuildYourOwnTest
JUnitTest class for the BuildYourOwn class (subclass of pizza) TODO Note: For some reasons JUnit just would not work with Maven or javafx for us, so we created a separate default intellij project in a folder "Testing" next to the main project folder All the java files in there are copied over from this project The tests run fine in there but in this project it would not work.
ChicagoPizza
Implementation for a PizzaFactory, creates different core.types of Chicago Style Pizzas
ChicagoStyleController
Controller class for the chicago-style-view that provides functionality for ordering chicago style pizzas
Crust
enum representing different core.types of pizza Crusts
CurrentCartController
Controller class for the current-cart-view that provides functionality for managing and placing orders in the cart
Customizable
a blueprint for objects that are Customizable
Deluxe
Represents a pizza that is Deluxe flavor, subclass of the Pizza class
Flavor
enum representing different core.types of pizza flavors
MainApplication
The main starting point of the JavaFX Program that launches the main window
MainController
Controller class for the main-view provide the options of choosing the pizza styles, checking the current order in the shopping cart, and managing the store orders.
Meatzza
Represents a pizza that is Meatzza flavor, subclass of the Pizza class
NYPizza
Implementation for a PizzaFactory, creates different core.types of NY Style Pizzas
NYStyleController
Controller class for the ny-style-view that provides functionality for ordering ny style pizzas
Order
This class represents a restaurant Order contains a list of all items that is in the order (pizzas)
Pizza
Represents a pizza order, toppings can be added
PizzaFactory
Blueprint for a pizza factory who is responsible for creating different core.types of pizzas, implements the "Abstract Factory" design pattern
PizzaStyleController
This class is a more generic abstract controller class for different kinds of pizza style controllers.
Size
enum representing different core.types of pizza sizes
StoreManager
This singleton class stores and manages all the orders in this restaurant, as well as the database for storing order history
StoreOrder
This class stores the order history of the restaurant contains a database of all the past orders
StoreOrdersController
Controller class for the store-orders-view that provides functionality for managing orders placed by users
Style
enum representing different core.types of pizza styles
Topping
enum representing different core.types of pizza toppings
